Name: Defense Warfare
About the game: Defense Warfare is a large-scale hero defense, with stunning graphics, unique level environments, and different game mods. Customize your Gunship’s abilities and appearance, choose the tower or trap that fits best, upgrade it in your own direction and leave nothing but a wasteland behind you. Key Features: Customize your Gunship with 17 unique abilities and reign chaos upon your enemies Dodge attacks as enemies vigorously fire back Choose from a multitude of unique towers and traps - 14 towers and 3 traps Use different in-game upgrades to craft your ideal tower. Customize your towers and upgrade them with unique perks for each tower Customize your appearance Play a variety of game modes, on 15 large-scale levels with different environments Observe the whole carnage from above with the Aerial View Obliterate destructibles like trees and fences Use bombardments to vanquish your enemies when you don’t have enough firepower Choose your preferred difficulty level
